question: Which bank will be charging Rs.150 for signature or photo verification?
explanation: The Nationalised bank Canara Bank have hiked charges for several services or facilities provided to customers. They charging Rs150 per case of attestation from 1st July for signature or photo verification as against the existing Rs.100. Whereas SBI, has revised its service charges for basic savings bank deposit (BSBD) accounts, whereby the customer would be charged Rs30 for issuance of a 10-leaf chequebook.
